TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Botan_go, title = Botan_go, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Botan_go} }

S.FORM: Botan go mki sku Heto Keng. su'unun kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 173.85 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 78.01 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 67.38 km²), 4,619 hi ku su'unun kwara alang hi kya, 1,806 buwan ku kwarakya, tiku sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga 4,318 hi, kyala kwara pinspung s'uli ga 93%. kwara sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga Taywang Gyencumin na Paywan, Amis ku smrrhu ku pyux s'uli taya kya. ays ptyaw sebu Botan go ays psgayun 6 ru 8 alang. 8 alang hani ga, Maljipa , Sinevaudjan , Macaran , Kus kus , Pungudan , Kapanan , Anteng , Draki . pinhknyan sraral kawas tay1874, minhtuw Botangsya' zikeng. kintzyux na Squliq rhzyal tay mkraya' na Botan go hya' ga Rayiyong go. tay mkyahu' na Botan go hya' ga Mansyu go. kayal tokusan 1. tokusan 2. tqinu 3. ryuhing 4. bgsyaw

Botan go mki sko Heto Keng. so'onon kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 173.85 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 78.01 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 67.38 km²), 4,619 hi ko so'onon kwara alang hi kya, 1,806 bowan ko kwarakya, tiko sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga 4,318 hi, kyala kwara pinspong s'oli ga 93%. kwara sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga Taywang Gyencomin na Paywan, Amis ko smrrho ko pyox s'oli taya kya. ays ptyaw sebo Botan go ays psgayon 6 ro 8 alang. 8 alang hani ga, Maljipa , Sinevaodjan , Macaran , Kos kos , Pongodan , Kapanan , Anteng , Draki . pinhknyan sraral kawas tay1874, minhtow Botangsya' zikeng. kintzyox na Sqoliq rhzyal tay mkraya' na Botan go hya' ga Rayiyong go. tay mkyaho' na Botan go hya' ga Mansyo go. kayal tokosan 1. tokosan 2. tqino 3. ryohing 4. bgsyaw
